alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 1:36AM CST until March 04 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Clear Boggy Creek near Caney affecting Atoka County.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC005-031945- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.Y.0001.000000T0000Z-230304T1800Z/ /CANO2.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 136 AM CST Fri Mar 3 2023 ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Clear Boggy Creek near Caney. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, The creek remains within its banks in western Atoka County and the northeastern edge of Bryan County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The Clear Boggy Creek is expected to rise to a crest of 23.3 feet this afternoon. - Action stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
